keyword: how many calories in a double cheeseburger
title: How Many Calories in a Double Cheeseburger?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a double cheeseburger, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and easy tweaks for your meal.
h1: How Many Calories in a Double Cheeseburger?
assumptions: Standard fast-food style: two 1/8 lb beef patties, two slices American cheese, sesame bun, ketchup, mustard, pickles, onions; cooked and assembled.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, restaurant, patty size, cheese type, condiments, and preparation. Check labels or apps for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A standard double cheeseburger contains about 550 calories with 30g protein and 40g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a double cheeseburger from McDonald's?
faqs.a: Around 450-550 kcal depending on size; check the app for exact.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a double cheeseburger?
faqs.a: Typically 30g from the beef patties and cheese.

faqs.q: Are double cheeseburgers high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, about 1200mg per burger from seasoning, cheese, and bun.

faqs.q: How does a double compare to a single cheeseburger?
faqs.a: A double has roughly double the calories and protein of a single.

faqs.q: Can I make a lower-calorie double cheeseburger?
faqs.a: Opt for lean beef, skip cheese, or use a lettuce wrap to cut 100-200 kcal.
